title: Organelles: The Emerging Signalling Chart of Mitochondrial Dynamics.
authors: Department of Biomedical Sciences, University of Padua, 35131 Padua, Italy.

Department of Biomedical Sciences, University of Padua, 35131 Padua, Italy; Department of Cell and Developmental Biology, Consortium for Mitochondrial Research, University College London, London WC1E 6BT, UK; The Francis Crick Institute, London NW1 1AT, UK. Electronic address: g.szabadkai@ucl.ac.uk.
text: Many molecular and functional details of single events in mitochondrial dynamics have been reported, but little is known about their coordination. A recent study describes how cellular Ca2+ signals, via remodelling the actin cytoskeleton, synchronise the formation of endoplasmic reticulum-mitochondria contacts with inner and outer mitochondrial membrane fission.
